_header: O First Founder and heavenly Creator
_description: The hymn ‘Conditor alme siderum’ — six stanzas rhyme royal

BLAdd34193.First Lines:
O first fownder and hevenly creatureOff sterys shynynge in þe
                    sperys hye…
BLAdd34193.Last Lines:
…More then men mey wrytyn or discerneBy tymes now and infinite
                    eterne
BLAdd34193.Editions:
Patterson,  Frank A. 
             “Hymnal from MS. Additional 34193, British Museum.” 
             Medieval Studies in Memory of Gertrude Schoepperle Loomis.
            Roger Sherman Loomis, ed. 
         New York: Columbia UP, 1927: 443-88: 444-6.
